,,,,,,,,"When we press any of these buttons, the text boxes and buttons fade out quickly.
If we press ""Continue"", the warning sequence is over. The camera starts a traveling down, covered by a quick fade out.

If we press ""Learn more"", we go to the next step of warning (see below).

If we press ""Quit"", OO says the line under, and when the player closes the line or after 4s. The screens fade out and the game closes.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"å¦‚æœæŒ‰ä¸‹è¿™äº›æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œæ–‡æœ¬æ¡†å’Œå„ä¸ªæŒ‰é’®éƒ½ä¼šè¿…é€Ÿæ·¡å‡ºã€‚

#3-01_Normalized,"Few weeks have passed, the cell has evolved.
Gloria says she had a dream and Bob insists on knowing what it is.
The scene transition into the actual dream, with Gloria in the empty apartment's living room (and Bob through the window). She stares at the dome in the sink, and finally decides to grab it and leave the apartment.
She says goodbye to her neighbours through their doors.
When she gets in the elevator, Bob is there, and she continues to tell him the story of her dream.
She finally leaves the building, and when the door slams behind her, she is sent back to the cell, with the gate and Bob behind her.

Bob leaves to prepare the breakfast, she asks to have some magazines.
She does her gym (gameplay)
The master intervenes and refuses magazines.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

,,,,,,,,"Glo has still her eyes closed, makes a step forward, she has free move.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"Glo has still her eyes closed, makes a step forward, she has free move."
,,,,,,,,"Moons gameplay:
By default the moons are dark, with no light/particles.
Walking over one of the 3 moons activates it (the moon becomes lit and the right-half moon is displayed).
Staying 2s over it changes for a the next moon (we can have a 0.5s fade between 2 moons):
1-right half
2-full
3-left half
4-dark (and right half again).
If Gloria leaves a moon and comes back again, she has to wait 2s to make it change.",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"Moons gameplay:
By default the moons are dark, with no light/particles.
Walking over one of the 3 moons activates it (the moon becomes lit and the right-half moon is displayed).
Staying 2s over it changes for a the next moon (we can have a 0.5s fade between 2 moons):
1-right half
2-full
3-left half
4-dark (and right half again).
If Gloria leaves a moon and comes back again, she has to wait 2s to make it change."
,,,,,,,,"To complete the minigame, Gloria has to create a logical serie of moons:
1 2 3
2 3 4
3 4 1
4 1 2
and reverse :
3 2 1
4 3 2
1 4 3
2 1 4
That's up to the player's intuition to say what's the right answer!",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,"To complete the minigame, Gloria has to create a logical serie of moons:
1 2 3
2 3 4
3 4 1
4 1 2
and reverse :
3 2 1
4 3 2
1 4 3
2 1 4
That's up to the player's intuition to say what's the right answer!"

Now that he has left, she starts listening to the cassettes, the actual ones he brought (she gave other ones). The music is cool and she doesnt understand the issue... until she hears Bob reharsing his character as the Master. We can also hear a sentence in the Master's voice, that we've heard recently (a pre recorded phrase that is played while Bob is downstairs to make it feel like there are two distinct characters). 
She is shocked. Bob=The Master. 
We dont see the cell for a moment, with Bob/Master voice still playing. A strong metalic sound brings back Gloria to the cell, it's the cell's door which has just closed, with Bob inside it, for the first time.
He advances on her; the screen cuts to black. We hear the sound of a strike and a scream.
